name: PoolManager
description: Core contract that manages Uniswap v4 pool state and operations

name: UniversalRouter
description: Router contract that aggregates swap paths and performs multi‑hop trades

name: PositionManager
description: Manages user positions and LP NFT minting on Uniswap v4

name: StateView
description: Read‑only view contract exposing pool state and price information

name: Quoter
description: Simulates swaps to provide quotes without executing them

name: PoolSwapTest
description: Test hook contract used to validate swap behaviour

name: PoolModifyLiquidityTest
description: Test hook for modifying liquidity in pools

name: Permit2
description: Shared token permit contract used across Uniswap components

name: Flaunch
description: High‑activity hook with thousands of pools and swaps on Base

name: VerifiedPoolsBasicHook
description: Hook ensuring pools meet verification criteria before trading

name: Politiswap
description: Swap‑oriented hook with moderate volume and TVL

name: PositionManager (HookRank)
description: Hook used to manage positions across pools on the Base network

name: BtcAccHook
description: Small hook that accumulates BTC with few pools and swaps

name: SpawnerHook
description: Spawns new pools/positions with high pool count and protocol fee collection

name: ContentmentHook
description: Low‑volume hook on Base focusing on stable liquidity

name: LimitOrderHook (HookRank)
description: Hook enabling limit orders in Uniswap v4 pools with tens of thousands of swaps

name: SwapHook
description: Template hook that counts the number of calls to `beforeSwap` and `afterSwap` for each pool

name: LiquidityHook
description: Example hook that tracks counts of liquidity additions and removals using `beforeAddLiquidity` and `beforeRemoveLiquidity`

name: AsyncSwapHook
description: Advanced example illustrating asynchronous swaps by returning a delta in `beforeSwap` and skipping Uniswap’s internal swap logic
